description: If you’re looking for a natural and organic oil to grow your eyelashes and eyebrows, Kate Blanc’s organic castor oil is a Godsent.

name: Dove Beauty Bar Gently Cleanses and Nourishes Sensitive Skin Effectively Washes Away Bacteria While Nourishing Your Skin, 3.75 oz, 16 Bars
description: Dove creates products that keep you feeling cared for, every day. The hypoallergenic, fragrance-free Dove Sensitive Skin Beauty Bar is specially formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers that won’t irritate sensitive skin while helping skin retain and replenish nutrients and moisture, revealing softer, smoother, and more radiant skin.

name: Amazon Basic Care Ibuprofen Tablets 200 mg, Pain Reliever/Fever ulcer (NSAID), Red, 500 Count
description: ACTIVE INGREDIENT: Amazon Basic Care Ibuprofen Tablets 200 mg contain ibuprofen 200 mg, a pain reliever/fever reducer (NSAID) Compare to the active ingredient in Advil

name: Learning Angular: A no-nonsense beginner's guide to building web applications with Angular 10 and TypeScript, 3rd Edition
description: Uncover Angular's potential for creating enterprise web applications ― from setting up the environment to deployment ― with the help of expert guidance, step-by-step explanations, and hands-on exercises

name: What's Mine and Yours
description: A community in the Piedmont of North Carolina rises in outrage as a county initiative draws students from the largely Black east side of town into predominantly white high schools on the west. For two students, Gee and Noelle, the integration sets off a chain of events that will tie their two families together in unexpected ways over the next twenty years.

name: The Lost Apothecary
description: Hidden in the depths of eighteenth-century London, a secret apothecary shop caters to an unusual kind of clientele. Women across the city whisper of a mysterious figure named Nella who sells well-disguised poisons to use against the oppressive men in their lives. But the apothecary’s fate is jeopardized when her newest patron, a precocious twelve-year-old, makes a fatal mistake, sparking a string of consequences that echo through the centuries.

name: Klara and the Sun
description: Klara and the Sun, the first novel by Kazuo Ishiguro since he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature, tells the story of Klara, an Artificial Friend with outstanding observational qualities, who, from her place in the store, watches carefully the behavior of those who come in to browse, and of those who pass on the street outside.

name: The Committed
description: The long-awaited new novel from one of America’s most highly regarded contemporary writers, The Committed follows the Sympathizer as he arrives in Paris as a refugee.

name: X-Acto No 1 Precision Knife
description: Make precise, fine cuts every time with the X-ACTO #1 Z-Series Knife with Safety Cap. This versatile knife comes with a #11 fine point zirconium nitride-coated blade for sharpness and strength, and the lightweight aluminum handle enables you to make agile cuts with ease.

name: Komelon SM5425 Speed Mark Gripper Acrylic Coated Steel Blade Measuring Tape, 1-Inch X 25Ft

name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill / Driver Kit
description: The DCD771C2 20V Max Lithium Ion Compact Drill/Driver Kit is lightweight and compact for working in tight spaces for long periods of time. High-speed transmission delivers 2-Speed variations allowing users to choose the level of performance needed for various applications.

name: EPAuto 1/2-inch Drive Click Torque Wrench
description: Our four modules of torque wrenches are manufactured and tested in Taiwan factory with professional engineers to meet the highest industry standards. They are good for cars, trucks, motorcycles and bicycle maintenance.
